meanings.definition: Having one side lower or smaller than the other.
meanings.sent1: The lopsided cake leaned to one side on the plate.
meanings.sent2: The table looked lopsided with one leg shorter than the others.
meanings.sent3: The lopsided drawing of a cat made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: Her lopsided smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The lopsided tree in the yard looked like it was dancing in the wind.

meanings.sent1: The lopsided seesaw made it hard for the kids to play.
meanings.sent2: The lopsided distribution of toys caused arguments among the siblings.
meanings.sent3: The lopsided sandwich was so big on one side, it almost toppled over.
meanings.sent4: His lopsided reasoning led to a flawed conclusion.
meanings.sent5: The lopsided boat struggled to stay afloat in the water.

meanings.definition: Uneven or asymmetrical in shape or arrangement.
meanings.sent1: The lopsided bookshelf wobbled when books were placed on one side.
meanings.sent2: The lopsided haircut made her look like she had bangs on only one side.
meanings.sent3: The lopsided jigsaw puzzle was missing a piece in the corner.
meanings.sent4: The lopsided garden had flowers blooming more on one side than the other.
meanings.sent5: The lopsided mountain peak stood out against the symmetrical skyline.
